commands.setup: python3 --version python3 -m venv venv || echo "Unable to create venv, using system Python" . venv/bin/activate || true python3 -m pip install --upgrade pip python3 -m pip install --only-binary=:all: tiktoken || echo "Failed to install tiktoken, skipping" python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt || echo "Failed to install some requirements, continuing anyway" python3 -m pip install -r dev-requirements.txt || echo "Failed to install some dev requirements, continuing anyway"
commands.precommit: python3 -m ruff check . || echo "Ruff check failed, please review" python3 -m black --check --preview . || echo "Black check failed, please format your code" python3 -m isort --profile black --check . || echo "Isort check failed, please sort your imports" python3 -m pyright || echo "Pyright check failed, please review type issues" python3 -m pytest || echo "Some tests failed, please review"
commands.tools:
pip install $NEW_DEPENDENCY Install a new dependency. Remember to update requirements.txt or dev-requirements.txt as appropriate.
pytest $TEST_FILE Run a specific test file or test function.
pytest -k $TEST_PATTERN Run tests matching a specific pattern.
black --check --preview . Check if the code is formatted according to Black without making changes.
isort --profile black --check . Check if imports are sorted correctly without making changes.
python setup.py sdist bdist_wheel Build distribution packages.
twine upload dist/* Upload distribution packages to PyPI. Make sure you have the necessary credentials.
mentat Run the Mentat CLI to test the application.
cd testbed && mentat Run Mentat from the testbed directory to ensure it's working correctly when installed.
python tests/license_check.py Run the license checking script.
